sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>stand</radical> on the <radical>Cliff</radical> of <radical>Life</radical> and <kanji>give birth</kanji> to a child. Oh no! You’re standing too close to the edge of the Cliff of Life! The baby falls off the cliff right after you give birth to it! In your despair, you throw all your <kanji>property</kanji> off the cliff too.
meaningInfo: The baby is falling off the cliff! Imagine the sheer terror you feel as the baby plummets towards the ground below.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>give birth</kanji>, and now this happens. Such bad luck. But wait! What's that sound? Sleigh bells? Could it be?! It's <reading>San</reading>ta-san (<ja>さん</ja>)! He caught your baby! And all your <kanji>property</kanji>.
readingInfo: Oh Santa-san. You're always here for me when I need you most. You can keep all my property and give it away as presents.
